name: R5-NamingSystemType-R4-NamingSystemType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NamingSystemType into FHIR R4

element.display: The naming system is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts; e.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.

target.display: The naming system is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts; e.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.

element.display: The naming system is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.).

target.display: The naming system is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.).

element.display: The naming system is used as the root for other identifiers and naming systems.

target.display: The naming system is used as the root for other identifiers and naming systems.
